document_data.name: Hulingishasa
document_data.mainbody: '''Hulingishasa''' was a [[sunwatcher]] in the [[Pasocada Basin]] in [[Maztica]].
document_data.History: In [[1362 DR]], he assisted the [[Gilded Priest]] [[Koyisqatapi]].
